scripts.create-db: PGPASSWORD=postgres dropdb  -h localhost -U postgres -p 6543 dev || true && PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d postgres -p 6543 -c 'create database dev;'
scripts.seed: yarn run create-db && ts-node --project ./tsconfig.json -e 'import * as dotenv from "dotenv"; dotenv.config(); import { migrate } from "./app/migrate"; migrate();'
